question: Which institution released the ‘Annual Report of the Ombudsman Schemes for 2019-20’?
explanation:
The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) released the Annual Report of the Ombudsman Schemes for the year 2019-20.
As per the report, all the three Ombudsmen- Banking, NBFC and Digital transactions received around 3.3 lakh complaints in 2019-20 as compared to around 2 lakh in 2018-19. It was an increase of around 65 per cent, out of which over 92 per cent were disposed off.
